channel.title: 1. 环境配置 on React18
channel.description: Recent content in 1. 环境配置 on React18

item.title: 1. 配置开发环境
item.description: 安装 NodeJS 安装 NodeJS wget -c https://nodejs.org/dist/v20.11.0/node-v20.11.0-darwin-arm64.tar.gz tar xf node-v20.11.0-darwin-arm64.tar.gz mv node-v20.11.0-darwin-arm64 /usr/local/nodejs 配置环境变量 export NODE_ROOT=/usr/local/nodejs export PATH=$NODE_ROOT/bin:$PATH alias cnpm='npm --registry=https://registry.npmmirror.com ' 配置国内源 yarn config set registry https://registry.npmmirror.com npm config set registry https://registry.npmmirror.com Chrome 插件 React Developer Tools

item.title: 2. vscode
item.description: 1. 插件 Quokka.js Path Intellisense JavaScript and TypeScript Nightly ES7+ React/Redux/React-Native snippets Auto Rename Tag

item.title: 3. Chrome
item.description: Chrome 插件 React Developer Tools Redux DevTools
